title: Functions of One Variable: Basic Concepts and Definitions Quiz
description: Test your understanding of functions, their properties, and basic types.

questions.question: What is a function?
options: A set of ordered pairs where each first element has exactly one second element
questions.explanation: A function is a relation where each input has exactly one output.

questions.question: What is the domain of a function?
options: The set of all possible output values
The set of all possible input values
questions.explanation: The domain is the set of all x-values for which the function is defined.

questions.question: Which of the following is a linear function?
questions.explanation: A linear function has the form f(x) = mx + b.

questions.question: What is a quadratic function?
questions.explanation: A quadratic function is a polynomial of degree 2.

questions.question: Which function is exponential?
questions.explanation: An exponential function has a variable in the exponent.

questions.question: What is the inverse of the exponential function f(x) = e^x?
questions.explanation: The natural logarithm is the inverse of the exponential function.

questions.question: Which of the following is a trigonometric function?
questions.explanation: Trigonometric functions include sine, cosine, tangent, etc.

questions.question: What is the range of the function f(x) = sin(x)?
questions.explanation: The sine function oscillates between -1 and 1.
